availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard P. Smith (Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Martha Smith. Married to Martha E. Smith. Father of Isaiah L. Smith, Albert C. Smith, Lucian D. Smith, and William M. Smith. Farmer and student in Calloway County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Conway County, Arkansas, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, District 2, p. 412A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Conway County, Lick Mountain, p. 561.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, District 2, p. 230A.
Find A Grave, "Richard P. Smith (1834-1898)," Memorial #82282894, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82282894 (accessed September 9, 2020).
